name: Hell Way
description:
Hell Way is the path taken to escape hell.

Story

She used to be all-powerful and terrified of hell, but they had grown tired of her impudence. A trap was set and Helly fell easily. Now she's trapped in a baby's body, and she needs to escape this endless cycle of death!

Gameplay

In Hell Way you need to run!

Go through the tortuous and labyrinthine path avoiding the undead and their shadows and collect energy spheres to destroy the crystals that obstruct the way.

Open the chests and find relief by recovering a tiny part of your power.

Remember: the death is not final, you are already in hell! But it will hurt, player, there's no way to go through Hell Way with no suffering!

Controls

W A S D – To Move

X – Game Menu

Open the Chests and regain your powers On the run:           Red Chest: Increases +1 Health Permanent:           Orange Chest: Increases +1 Defense           Purple Chest: Increases +1 Attack           Yellow Chest: Increases +1 Dodge           Green Chest: Increases +1 Initiative Consumable:           Light Blue Chest: Increases +1 Barrier           Dark Blue Chest: Increases +1 Run           Dark Chest: Increases +1 Shadow Protection Instantaneous:           Recover All Health Early Access: Suffering Test

Leave your impression in the comments to help adjust the hellish suffering level.
